title: Consumers with a newspaper or magazine subscriptions in the U.S. 2017 , by age group
summary: At the beginning of 2017 , 41 % of Consumers newspaper an online video or music subscriptions confirmed that they had an active U.S. subscriptions at the time of survey .

Millennials and Gen-Xers were more likely to have a U.S. subscriptions than their older peers , which comes as no surprise given that U.S. is considered the most indispensable TV and video source among Consumers aged between 16 to 34 years old .
One of the most appealing aspects of U.S. for viewers is the availability of original content , which has fast become one of the keys to the company 's success .
